alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 2:42AM PDT until April 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches above 4000 feet, with 10 to 15 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
